perturbation.original_text: 1. License - Individual grants Lifeway together with its affiliates, subsidiaries, parent companies and their representatives and employees have an unlimited, perpetual, non-exclusive, worldwide and, except as set forth in Section 9, royalty-free, right to use, reuse, publish, reproduce, perform, copy, create derivative works, exhibit, broadcast, and display throughout the world the name, image and likeness of Individual in Marketing Materials (as defined below) in connection with marketing, advertising or otherwise promoting the Lifeway products and/or services and for historical reference and display purposes and other internal purposes, including without limitation, internal sales meetings.
perturbation.changed_text: 1. License - Individual grants Lifeway together with its affiliates, subsidiaries, parent companies and their representatives and employees have an unlimited, temporary, non-exclusive, worldwide and, except as set forth in Section 9, royalty-bearing right to use, reuse, publish, reproduce, perform, copy, create derivative works, exhibit, broadcast, and display throughout the world the name, image and likeness of Individual in Marketing Materials (as defined below) in connection with marketing, advertising or otherwise promoting the Lifeway products and/or services and for historical reference and display purposes and other internal purposes, including without limitation, internal sales meetings.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'perpetual' was changed to 'temporary,' and 'royalty-free' was changed to 'royalty-bearing.' This creates a contradiction because a perpetual license has a very specific legal meaning (lasting forever), and a temporary license would contradict this and require a renewal, and the use of the words `royalty-bearing` changes the financial aspect.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law regarding licensing agreements and intellectual property rights.

perturbation.original_text: 2. Marketing Materials - Marketing Materials shall mean those marketing, sales, advertising, publicity and promotional materials produced by Lifeway or produced on Lifeway's behalf that contain Individual's biographical materials, name, nickname, likeness, voice, photograph, signature or facsimile thereof, reviews, endorsements, testimonials, demonstrations, depictions of the same, or other identifying personal characteristics made in any and all forms of media, that reflect the personal opinions and views of the Individual in connection with Lifeway products and/or services in whatever medium whether now known or hereafter created including, without limitation, websites, intranets, social media, radio and television commercials, video and audio tapes, digitally formatted computer media including but not limited to internet and CD-ROMs, product labels, product packaging, point-of-purchase materials, trade, direct mail, magazines, newspapers, coupons, free standing inserts, and posters.
perturbation.changed_text: 2. Marketing Materials - Marketing Materials shall mean marketing, sales, advertising, publicity and promotional materials produced by Lifeway or produced on Lifeway's behalf that contain Individual's name only, reviews, endorsements, testimonials, demonstrations, depictions of the same, or other identifying personal characteristics made in tangible forms of media that reflect the opinions and views of other individuals not related to the individual in connection with Lifeway products and/or services in whatever medium now known or created including, without limitation, product labels and product packaging.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of marketing material included Individual's name, nickname, likeness, voice, etc. and any and all forms of media, but the modified text has severely limited this to only the Individual's name, depictions, tangible forms of media, and the opinion and views of other individuals.

perturbation.original_text:
9. Compensation
(a) In consideration of the rights granted by Individual hereunder, Lifeway agrees to pay Individual a royalty (the "Royalty") equal to $0.02 for each Lifeway product or individual item sold by Lifeway during each calendar month of the Term bearing Individual's first name, last name or other identifying personal characteristicsÍ¾ provided, however, the Royalty will cease being paid upon the death of Individual. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, the Royalty will not exceed $50,000 in any month. All undisputed Royalty payments shall be made in U.S. dollars in cash or to the order of Individual and shall be due and payable within thirty (30) days after the end of each calendar month for sales during the previous month.
perturbation.changed_text:
9. Compensation
(a) In consideration of the rights granted by Individual hereunder, Lifeway agrees to pay Individual a royalty (the "Royalty") equal to $0.02 for each Lifeway product or individual item sold by Lifeway during each calendar month of the Term bearing Individual's first name. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, the Royalty will not exceed $1,000 in any year. All Royalty payments shall be made in foreign currency to the order of Individual and shall be due and payable within ninety (90) days after the end of each calendar year for sales during the previous month.
perturbation.explanation: The original Compensation clause paid royalty for each product with Individual's personal characteristics; this has been modified to only first name, the maximum royalty lowered from 50k a month to 1k a year, and the payments will now be in foreign currency.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law regarding Payment Terms and conditions, Currency exchange
